Title: ImageMol human beta-secretase-1 (BACE-1) inhibition
Description: This model has been developed using ImageMol, a deep learning model pretrained on 10 million unlabelled small molecules and fine-tuned in a second step to predict the binding of inhibitors to the human beta secretase 1 (BACE-1) protein. The BACE-1 dataset from MoleculeNet contains 1522 compounds with their associated pIC50. A compound with pIC50 => 7 is considered a BACE-1 inhibitor.
Interpretation: Probability of BACE-1 inhibition (>0.5: Inhibitor). Compounds with pIC50 => 7 are considered BACE-1 inhibitors
